feed.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org

entry.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: Google Chrome's automatic update framework, Omaha, has been made open source. However, it may be too heavy for just one package. Mike Hearn inquired about an existing auto-update framework that can be modified to support threshold signed updates, where the updates would download in the background and the app would ask the user to restart once the update is available locally, similar to how Chrome handles updates.
